styleRef.intro: This is the page where all of the portfolio style are tested.

experienceCard.title: Thecnical and technological manager of space infrastructure
experienceCard.tech: Flying cars - Terraforming Robot - Spatial plant

description.1:
On mars, I was assigned to build flying cars before shipping them on planet Earth
, and also on others colonies like Reach, Binterall and even Newsaka.
description.2:
On the solar station "Infinity", I was monitoring the Dyson sphere,
 to make sure that the energy production was correct for the colonies on the solar system.
description.3:
On different space station near the Orion nebula, I was attached to a team of terraformers,
 for terraforming the new human empire colony: Shear
